Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Class BindBatchValues

java.lang.Object
io.github.zero88.jooqx.BindBatchValues
public final class BindBatchValues extends Object
Represents a holder keeping dummy values and list of binding records
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • JDBC batch operations
  • InsertSetStep.set(Map)
  • UpdateSetStep.set(Map)
  • MergeMatchedSetStep.set(Map)
API Note:
With dummy value records, you can predefine a field value, then if a bind record is missing this field value then system will auto-detect and fallback to the predefined value. See: registerValue(Field, Object)
